titles.title: A bill for the relief of Tracey McFarlane.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs.

bill.summary: 9/30/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the naturalization of a named individual, notwithstanding her age, under a provision of the Immigration and Nationality Act relating to naturalization of children of a citizen parent.
